name: Zombie Mall
overview: A strategy game that appears to be based on the movie, Dawn of Dead. It is a turn-based strategy game where you have to seal off the mall and kill off all of the zombies without losing any of your party members. - Zombies in a mall - Turn-based squad shooter - laser squad style gameplay, more like Act of War (shareware) - 2D top down view - mouse controlled - simplistic tile graphics - can break into shops for supplies, i.e. ammo/guns - can shoot out windows - small footprint game, possibly only a single executable
